channel.title: Dragoș Străinu's blog
channel.description: I am Dragoș (Dragosh), a Front-end Software Engineer, Hackathoner, OSS enthusiast.

item.title: How to gradually add an eslint rule
item.description: Sometimes you decide to add a new eslint plugin or rule to your javascript project. To not do 2000+ files change you may try to gradually change files with lint-staged.

item.title: How I found a bug in 2000 files

item.title: 9 Ways to Win a Hackathon... Without Coming in First Place
